import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import {useCart} from "react-use-cart" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" export default function Produit({name, price, image, item, id}){ const {addItem} = useCart() return( <>
{name}
{name}

{price} Fcfa

{price} Fcfa

addItem(item)}>Ajouter au panier
) }
